item.title: Game of Dashboards: one brain, four frameworks [Part 2: Bokeh, HoloViz]
item.description: This is the second part of the dashboard framework comparison. The first part is here. In the previous episode… Let’s pick up where we left off, shall we? Last time I sketched the idea of making the same dashboard with four different frameworks. We are halfway through: so far we’ve seen Streamlit and Dash. But there is more out there! In this second part I will be showcasing Bokeh and HoloViz.
